head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CAPLIN, LILLIAN (AKA GLEN LINCOLN)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CAPLIN, LILLIAN (AKA GLEN LINCOLN)

block.p: CAPLIN-Lillian (aka Glen Lincoln). On February 22, 2001. Beloved wife of the late Stuart. Loving mother of Wendy, David and Satya. Dear sister of Allen and Stanley. Adoring grandmother of Jonathan, Stephanie and Bobby. Service on Sunday, 2:15 PM, at ''The Riverside,'' 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
